channel.title: Czar Combat
channel.description: Hey guys, me and my friend an owner of a server,are looking for a czar with retaliation, npcs that face their attacker, agressive NPCs and they follow your player up to 7 squares. We need Good npc combat. If you have any source/NpcHandler that has these things, contact me at Owner.tony@hotmail.com or just reply below, this must be a 317 czar server. If you are able to add it, please contact me too. And to let you know, if you have a source that fulfills these needs, [b]YOU WILL GET PAYED REAL MONEY$[/b] Thanks. :)

item.title: Czar Combat
item.dc:creator: @skillcapes9 skillcapes9
item.description:
@skillcapes9 wrote:

Clawz fury:

Czar is the biggest fail in exsistence, use Project Insanity or Delta. You will not get ANYWHERE in server making with Czar, trust me, I know.

Just to tell you, this server is already made, has been running for over a year, run by a VPS and has Vbulletin as a forum. I think we got somewhere.

Read full topic
